ajxpdriver.name: ftp
ajxpdriver.label: FTP Server
ajxpdriver.description: Connect to a remote FTP server

param.name: PATH
param.label: Path
param.description: Real path to the root folder on the server

param.name: FTP_USER
param.label: User
param.description: Ftp User name - Can be overriden on a per-user basis.

param.name: FTP_PASS
param.label: Password
param.description: Ftp User password - Can be overriden on a per-user basis.

param.name: CHARSET
param.label: Character encoding
param.description: When not advertized by server, use this encoding

param.name: DEFAULT_RIGHTS
param.label: Default Rights
param.description: This right pattern (empty, r, or rw) will be applied at user creation for this repository.

param.name: RECYCLE_BIN
param.label: Recycle folder
param.description: Buffer before real suppression of files on the server.

param.name: TMP_UPLOAD
param.label: Temporary Folder
param.description: Temporary folder on the local server used for file uploads. For the moment, it must be placed under your ajaxplorer folder and you must create it and set it writeable by Apache.
